marklogic.body:
what happened overthe years??? " I’ve finally grown up. It took a little thing called Nduku that can’t talk or walk, to get me to grow up, but I’m . I’m smart girl, I don’t Burn through my payslip – I’m organised, I’m automated and regulated"???
i imagine those ladies blindndly following your extra word on no kids,divorce now, buy the BMW, youself to death, must grow up as well? or was it about the money at the job?
i suggest a career change, join your peers in parliament, Always saying one thing and doing another!!!!
as for me and my family, we shall keep the benz! we have been frugal all along.
